Package eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining.heuristics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdditionalDiscoveryMiner  
    MemoryMiner  
    RandomMiner
    This class provides a SocialGraphMiner that recommends random interactions among previous ones.
    RepeatAndReplyMiner
    This class provides a SocialGraphMiner that re-recommends previous interactions with alters based on the chronological order.
    RepeatAndReplyMiner.OrderTimestamp
    This class is used to hold information about the order alters have been interacted with or have sent interaction to the device.
    RepeatMiner
    This class provides a SocialGraphMiner that re-recommends previous interactions with alters based on their chronological order.
    RepeatMiner.SendOrderTimestamp
    This class is used to hold information about the order alters have been interacted with.
    ReplyMiner
    This class provides a SocialGraphMiner that re-recommends previous interactions with alters based on the order of received messages.
    ReplyMiner.ReceiveOrderTimestamp
    This class is used to hold information about the order alters have been interacted with.
